Rafael Lopes wrote:

> Hi all,
> 
> Iï¿½m trying to learn about JUNIT. I have created a test class and I run it.
> I defined a method called "testSoma". It has to returns an error, 
> because it tests if "2+2=4", but I coded to compare with "5", not to "4".
> When I run the JUNIT test, it not returns any error. Do I did something 
> wrong?

I do not know whether this is a big problem, but /do not/ override 
runTest(). I recommend you look at 
http://www.diasparsoftware.com/articles/JUnit/jUnitStarterGuide.html and 
follow the examples there. It will help you.
